data.name: Car Scrapyard Simulator
data.detailed_description:
WE RECOMMEND YOU TO CHECK THESE GAMES...

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1455740/Outlaw_Driver_Simulator/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1498300/Chop_Shop_Simulator/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1548810/Illegal_Transporter_Simulator/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1535170/Emergency_Road_Services_Simulator/


About the Game


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1250090/Car_Thief_Simulator/

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ie3AwAla9ro
Car Scrapyard Simulator is a game in which you not only have to properly manage the entire facility, take care of machines, employees, car delivery, it is a game that focuses primarily on the monetization of your business. You have to build an empire of selling used car parts and face the competition. Everything can be sold if you pack it well.


Use various machines adapted to the harsh conditions on the junkyard. A wide range of choices will allow you to choose the right equipment from pallet-trucks and tow-trucks to crushers and hoists. You provide many services, so you must be ready for the toughest challenges.

Where will you get the parts? It's easy! The open-world, known from games such as Outlaw Driver Simulator, Chop Shop Simulator, Emergency Road Services Simulator, and Illegal Transporter Simulator, will allow you to revisit your friends' locations. Drop into showrooms, garages, or chop-shops and get wrecks from which you can get working parts. And then? Then sell everything on the market.


The scrapyard expansion model is very player-friendly. You will be able to add new and useful machines, places and expand your office. All of this will increase your company's turnover until you finally become a millionaire.

Key Features:
  • An open-world known from other developer games!
  • Business solutions
  • Real-time company management
  • A wide range of machines
  • Junkyard expansion
  • Mini-games
  • Destroying car debris
  • Realistic 3D graphics

data.short_description: Disassembling a car into parts and selling them later is nothing difficult for you, after all, you are the owner of a cars' scrapyard - and this is Car Scrapyard Simulator! Expand your headquarters full of broken and used cars. Manage your empire - a scrap empire!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit OS
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 / AMD Radeon RX 460
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
